trans-unit.source: Provides the look and feel property settings to a top-level workflow in a design-time environment.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Workflow themes define the look and feel of a workflow design surface.
This includes any background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow design surface.
An ambient theme contains the default display properties for the workflow design surface.
It provides settings to be used across the entire design surface (for example, the grid, background and foreground colors, read-only designer color, and so on).
It can use either user-selected values or the values from the operational system.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> class by using a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> with which the ambient theme is associated.
Gets or sets the ambient back color on a workflow design surface.
When you set the BackColor property, it negates the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.BackgroundBrush%2A> property value.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the ambient background color.
The default is white.
Gets the ambient brush used to fill graphical shapes displayed on the workflow design surface.

If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.BackColor%2A> property value.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> value that represents the background brush of the workflow on a design surface.
Gets the ambient bold font setting for the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> value that determines whether the text on the workflow design surface is bold.
Gets the ambient border width for objects that are placed onto the workflow design surface.
An integer that represents the border width of objects placed on the workflow design surface.
Gets the ambient brush associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.

If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.CommentIndicatorColor%2A> property value.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that is associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.
Gets or sets the ambient color associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that is associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.
Gets the ambient pen associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.

If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.CommentIndicatorColor%2A> property value and its width set to 1.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> value that is associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.
Gets or sets the ambient size settings for activity designers on the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerSize"></xref> enumeration value that determines the size of activity designers on the workflow design surface.
The default value is <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerSize"></xref>.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ambient theme associated with the workflow design surface draws grayscales.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ambient theme associated with the workflow draws grayscales; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ambient theme associated with the workflow design surface draws rounded shapes.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ambient theme associated with the workflow draws rounded shapes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ambient theme associated with the workflow design surface draws shadows.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ambient theme associated with the workflow draws shadows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the ambient brush associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.

If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.DropIndicatorColor%2A> property value.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.
Gets or sets the ambient color associated with an object that you drags onto the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.
Gets the ambient pen associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.

If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.DropIndicatorColor%2A> property value and its width set to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.BorderWidth%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.
Gets the ambient font settings for the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that represents the ambient font settings for the workflow design surface.
Gets or sets the ambient font name for the workflow design surface.
A string that represents the ambient font name for the workflow design surface.
Gets or sets the ambient fore color property for the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the ambient fore color for the workflow design surface.
Gets the ambient foreground brush for the workflow design surface.

If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ForeColor%2A> property value.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> value that represents the ambient foreground brush.
Gets the ambient foreground pen for the workflow design surface.

If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.DropIndicatorColor%2A> property value, its width set to 1, and its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle?displayProperty=fullName>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> value that represents the ambient foreground pen.
Gets the ambient height and width of glyphs on the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> value that represents the ambient height and width of glyphs on the workflow design surface.
Gets or sets the ambient grid color for the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the grid color for the workflow design surface.
Gets the ambient size of the grid to display on the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> value that represents the height and width of the grid to display on the workflow design surface.
Gets or sets the ambient grid style for the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle"></xref> value that represents the dash style for the grid.
The default setting is <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle"></xref>.

Performs additional initialization tasks for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> class that are not performed by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.%23ctor%2A>.

If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A> returns `true`, Initialize sets all <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> properties to the values defined by the operating system.
Gets the ambient brush settings for major grids on the workflow design surface.

If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.GridColor%2A> property value.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> associated with the major grid on the workflow design surface.
Gets the ambient pen settings for major grids on the workflow design surface.

If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.GridColor%2A> property value, its width set to 1, and its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> associated with the major grid on the workflow design surface.
Gets the ambient margin settings for the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the margin settings on the workflow design surface.
Gets the ambient pen settings for minor grids on the workflow design surface.

If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> with its color calculated based on the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.GridColor%2A> property value, its width set to 1, and its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle?displayProperty=fullName>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> associated with the minor grid on the workflow design surface.

Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> when the value of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"></xref> enumeration changes.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> specifies the source of ambient theme properties for classes that inherit from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> class.
The two possible sources are the operating system and the designer-specified settings.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"></xref> enumeration value to which the setting was changed.
Gets the ambient brush used to fill graphical shapes associated with read-only items displayed on the workflow design surface.

If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> object with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ReadonlyIndicatorColor%2A> property value.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that represents the brush associated with read-only items on the workflow on a design surface.
Gets or sets the ambient color for read-only items on the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the ambient color for read-only items on the workflow design surface.
Gets or sets the ambient color for selected items on the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the ambient color for read-only items on the workflow design surface.
Gets the ambient foreground brush used to fill graphical shapes associated with selected items displayed on the workflow design surface.

If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> object with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionForeColor%2A> property value.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that represents the brush associated with read-only items on the workflow on a design surface.
Gets the ambient foreground pen settings for selected items on the workflow design surface.

If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) by default it will return a `Pen` with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionForeColor%2A> property value and its width set to 1.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> associated with the foreground of selected items on the workflow design surface.
Gets or sets the ambient pattern color for items that you select on the workflow design surface.

If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionPatternPen%2A> is not null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) when you set SelectionPatternColor, SelectionPatternColor will dispose of any resources used by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionPatternPen%2A> and set it to `null` (`Nothing`).
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the ambient pattern color for items that you select on the workflow design surface.
Gets the ambient pen settings for the pattern associated with selected items on the workflow design surface.

If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionPatternColor%2A> property value, its width set to 1, and its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle?displayProperty=fullName>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> associated with the pattern of selected items on the workflow design surface.
Gets the ambient size of a selected item on the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the ambient property settings for selected items on the workflow design surface.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workflow design surface displays configuration errors.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow design surface is to display configuration errors; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the workflow design surface displays designer borders.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow design surface displays designer borders; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether grids will be shown on the workflow design surface.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if grids will be displayed on the workflow design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the text quality to display on the workflow design surface.
TextQuality allows you to determine whether the text displayed on a workflow design surface, and all its child designers, is anti-aliased or aliased.
Anti-aliased text provides higher quality text display, while aliased text requires fewer resources to maintain.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TextQuality"></xref> that specifies the text quality settings to use on the workflow design surface.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> uses the theme settings of the operating system.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> uses theme settings of the operating system; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the ambient alignment settings for watermark images on the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref> that specifies the ambient alignment settings for watermark images on the workflow design surface.
The default is <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref>.
Gets or sets the ambient path to the image to display as a watermark on the workflow design surface.
Use WatermarkImagePath to associate an image as a watermark image for a workflow design surface.

If WatermarkImagePath is not `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) when you set WatermarkImagePath, WatermarkImagePath disposes of any resources used by WatermarkImagePath and sets its value to `null` (`Nothing`).
A string that contains the ambient path to the image to display as a watermark on the workflow design surface.
The default is an empty string.
Gets the ambient image to associate with the workflow design surface as its watermark.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> to associate an image as a watermark image for a workflow design surface.

If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> is not `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) when you set <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> disposes of any resources used by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> and sets its value to `null` (`Nothing`).
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to use as a watermark on the workflow design surface.
